TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed X509CertificateRecordFields extends System.Enum

Docs.remarks: The record fields are used when querying the for certificates.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MimeKit.Cryptography.X509CertificateRecordFields Algorithms = int32(8)

Docs.summary: The "algorithms" field is used for storing the last known list of values that are supported by the client associated with the certificate.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MimeKit.Cryptography.X509CertificateRecordFields AlgorithmsUpdated = int32(16)

Docs.summary: The "algorithms updated" field is used to store the timestamp of the most recent update to the Algorithms field.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MimeKit.Cryptography.X509CertificateRecordFields Certificate = int32(32)

Docs.summary: The "certificate" field is sued for storing the binary data of the actual certificate.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MimeKit.Cryptography.X509CertificateRecordFields Id = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The "id" field is typically just the ROWID in the database.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MimeKit.Cryptography.X509CertificateRecordFields PrivateKey = int32(64)

Docs.summary: The "private key" field is used to store the encrypted binary data of the private key associated with the certificate, if available.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MimeKit.Cryptography.X509CertificateRecordFields Trusted = int32(2)

Docs.summary: The "trusted" field is a boolean value indicating whether the certificate is trusted.
